Package org.skistation.services

Class PassService

java.lang.Object
org.skistation.services.PassService
@Service public class PassService extends Object
Represents a pass service class. It provides methods to perform operations on the pass table in the database.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    PassService(PassRepository passRepository)
    Constructs a new pass service with the specified pass repository.

    • getPassById

      public Optional<Pass> getPassById(Integer id)
      Retrieves a pass by their ID.
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the pass to retrieve
      Returns:
      an Optional containing the pass if found, or an empty Optional if not

    • modifyPass

      public Optional<Pass> modifyPass(Pass pass)
      Modifies a pass in the database.
      Parameters:
      pass - the pass to modify
      Returns:
      an Optional containing the modified pass if found, or an empty Optional if not

      Returns:

    • suspendPass

      public Optional<Pass> suspendPass(Integer passId, String email, Integer phone)
      Suspends a pass by their ID if the given email and phone match the client's.
      Parameters:
      passId - the ID of the pass to suspend
      email - the email of the client
      phone - the phone of the client
      Returns:
      an Optional containing the suspended pass if found and suspended, or an empty Optional if not

    • resumePass

      public Optional<Pass> resumePass(Integer passId, String email, Integer phone)
      Resumes a pass by their ID if the given email and phone match the client's.
      Parameters:
      passId - the ID of the pass to resume
      email - the email of the client
      phone - the phone of the client
      Returns:
      an Optional containing the resumed pass if found and resumed, or an empty Optional if not
